son_t Struct Reference
Stratify Object Notation » File Handling (Create/Append/Open/Close)

#include <son.h>

Detailed Description

Defines the data type for handling files.

All the members are managed internally.

Here is an example:

son_t h;
son_stack_t stack[10];
son_create(&h, "/home/data.son", stack, 10);
son_write_str(&h, "str0", "Hello");
son_write_str(&h, "str1", "World");
son_close(&h);
See also
son_create(), son_append()
